com.pddstudio.networkutils

Class PingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pddstudio.networkutils.abstracts.AbstractService
      • com.pddstudio.networkutils.PingService

  • public class PingService
extends AbstractService
    A Service for executing Ping requests on a given target address.

      • setTargetAddress

        public PingService setTargetAddress(java.lang.String targetAddress)
        Set the target address (localhost by default)
        Parameters:
        targetAddress - - The target address to ping. This can be an internal or external address.
        Returns:
        The current PingService instance.

        Check whether the service is running or not.
        Returns:

      • getResponseType

        public java.lang.Object getResponseType()
        The return type of this service. Objects retrieved via ProcessCallback.onProcessUpdate(Object) must be casted to PingResponse in order to be able to work with the response.
        Specified by:
        getResponseType in class AbstractService
        Returns:
        PingResponse
